title: 24 Heart Melting House Cats Who Have Nothing But Love to Give
description: Much like how the medical world takes a plant an concentrates the active ingredients in it to create a new medicine, we have too taken the whole of the feline world and concentrated the sweetest, fluffiest, most wholesome cat children the internet has to offer, to create this list of heart melting house cats who have nothing but love to give.Now, you might ask yourself, why would they do this? What purpose does this serve? Well, we will tell you. These heart melting felines are the antidote to the work week blues, straight and simple. Your boss got you down? Heart melting cats. You missed your deadline? Heart melting cats. Your partner is leaving you? Heart melting cats are all we need to make a melancholy day into a marvelous day.
author: Laurent Shinar
excerpt: 24 Heart Melting House Cats Who Have Nothing But Love to Give - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals
text: Wow, what an emotional investment this cute kitten has put into his work helping his pawrents shred documents. If you were wondering what dire hard love looked like, then look no further. Putting yourself in such a position that you are knocked out after giving all the love you have to give, is the hardest way to love. Love comes in many shapes and sizes. And as you can see this tiny kitten has a large dose of love to give his pawrent. And even his slightly clawminal transgression is filled with love because he could have gone for far more cheese than he did, and the fact that he had self-restraint can only be a reflection of his love for his pawrent.
html:
Wow, what an emotional investment this cute kitten has put into his work helping his pawrents shred documents. If you were wondering what dire hard love looked like, then look no further. Putting yourself in such a position that you are knocked out after giving all the love you have to give, is the hardest way to love.

Love comes in many shapes and sizes. And as you can see this tiny kitten has a large dose of love to give his pawrent. And even his slightly clawminal transgression is filled with love because he could have gone for far more cheese than he did, and the fact that he had self-restraint can only be a reflection of his love for his pawrent.
